tool_description: Shows the weather details of particular area in UK by providing valid postcode
name: UK weather API
title: UK weather API

api_list.name: UK weather API
api_list.description: Shows weather details of particular area in UK by the postcode

api_list.name: uk weather api
api_list.description: show the weather details of particular area in uk by providing the postcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com/weather/BA1 0AA"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uk-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com/weather/{postcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uk-weather-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
